channel.title: I need help cause no one can join my server
channel.description: Okay so i portforwarded did everything ( im a beginner ) got no ip and stuff and i created a zip folder containing my cache and jar file when i uploaded to rapidshare it wokred so my freind downloaded it and ran it when he got on the log in screen he got error connecting to server and i was runnign the server to it said oline. so how do i get him to log in?

item.title: I need help cause no one can join my server
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Okay so i change the gui file to my ip adress and my firewall was off
so what do i do lol? when i clicked firewall setting it came up general ( turn it on or off )
Exceptions ( says programs )
(Add Program) (Edit) (Add Port) each of the things that are listed are checked then it says advanced and it says network conection settings wat do i click? and wat do i do lol

Read full topic
item.source: I need help cause no one can join my server

item.title: I need help cause no one can join my server
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

There’s no need to turn off your firewall, just make TCP/UDP ports in your firewall open, you can do that through settings.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help cause no one can join my server

item.title: I need help cause no one can join my server
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

[quote=“fmcb, post:2, topic:375301”]did u change ip in gui.java and turn off firewall???[/quote] i did change my ip in gui java but i dont think i turned off firwall

Read full topic
item.source: I need help cause no one can join my server

item.title: I need help cause no one can join my server
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

First of all, ensure your ports are open successfully. You can do that by clicking here.

If your port is open, make sure the firewall is open to the port by going into the firewall settings (varies on different firewall programs).

If you have your own client make sure the client is set to your no-ip address and port, you should connect fine.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help cause no one can join my server

item.title: I need help cause no one can join my server
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

change your ip and port to your no-ip in your client and server

Read full topic
